name: Daily COP
description: Daily COP is a stablecoin pegged to the Colombian Peso to modernise the Colombian financial system by offering instantaneous and borderless P2P payments accessible to everyone. The Daily community is building and supporting financial services around the Daily COP token that give all people access to digital financial services and let them enter the crypto-space with a familiar and stable currency that will open a new world of opportunities for them to thrive.
